standard_metadata.standard_description: Fluently add, subtract, multiply, and divide multi-digit decimals using the standard algorithm for each operation.

$\begin{array}{rr}\\ {37.}\overline{\Big)188.7} \end{array}$  Let's start by shifting the decimals one place value to the right. [[☃ explanation 1]]
$\begin{array}{rr} .\phantom.\\ {37.}\overline{\Big)188.7} \end{array}$  Bring the decimal up into the answer (the quotient).
$\begin{array}{rr} .\phantom.\\ {37.}\overline{\Big)\blueE188.7} \end{array}$  How many times does $37$ go into $\blueE1$?
$\begin{array}{rr} \maroonE0\phantom{00}.\phantom.\\ {37.}\overline{\Big)\blueE188.7} \end{array}$  $\blueE1\div 37 = \maroonE0$.
